# Awesome Nutrient

![The building blocks for digital transformation.](./resources/header.png)

[![Awesome](https://awesome.re/badge-flat.svg)](https://awesome.re)
[![Chat](https://img.shields.io/badge/chat-on_discord-7289da.svg)](https://discord.gg/Z754Pfb8bD)

This repository contains examples built with [Nutrient](https://www.nutrient.io/). These examples are not officially supported, which means they may stop working and not be fixed, but they exist to serve for inspiration. Read [the disclaimer](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-nutrient/blob/master/DISCLAIMER.md) or [reach out if you have questions](https://support.nutrient.io/hc/en-us/requests/new).

## Web

A wide variety of examples showcasing what Nutrient Web SDK can do can be found in the [Example Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-web-examples-catalog). You can also [try them online](https://web-examples.our.services.nutrient-powered.io/).

- **Electronic signatures** — Use our API to add electronic signature images to PDFs.
- **Watermarks** — Add custom content (like images, text, and logos) as watermarks to your PDF pages.
- **Image annotations** — Annotate images with Nutrient Web SDK.
- **Custom UI for annotations** — Create a fully customized UI for working with annotations.
- **Custom annotation permissions** — Define custom permissions for annotation types.
- **Custom annotation tools** — Add your own tools or actions when an annotation is selected.
- **Custom toolbar tools** — Add custom tools to the PDF toolbar.
- **PDF page manipulation** — Add, remove, reorder, or rotate pages in a PDF.
- **Advanced PDF search** — Modify PDF search behavior.
- **Custom overlays** — Extend PDFs by adding your own elements to pages.
- **Selective area revealing** — Allow users to hide/reveal areas on a PDF page.
- **HTML-based annotation customization** — Enhance or replace existing PDF annotations using custom HTML.
- **Dark mode** — Switch to dark mode programmatically.
- **Custom views and drag and drop** — Add custom views for dragging and dropping image elements.
- **Document editor customization** — Customize the document editor toolbar and footer items.
- **Page flip effect** — Create a magazine-like browsing experience.
- **Permissions enforcement** — Set permissions based on JSON Web Token (JWT) parameters.
- **Electronic signatures persistence** — Keep electronic signatures across page refreshes.

## Web SDK Examples

- [Web Examples](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples)
- [React](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/react)
- [Angular](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/angular)
- [Next](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/nextjs)
- [Nuxt]( https://github.com/PSPDFKit/nutrient-web-examples/tree/main/examples/nuxtjs)

#### Annotations

- [Watermark from text annotation](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BXG4gICAgICAgIGluc3RhbmNlLnBhZ2VJbmZvRm9ySW5kZXgocGFnZUluZGV4KVxuICAgICAgKVxuICAgIClcbiAgKS5yZWR1Y2UoKGFjYywgcGFnZUluZm8pID0%%253D)
  - Dynamically add watermark text annotations to PDF pages before flattening them into a document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A6ydoCpCKMI)

- [Flatten annotation on annotation create](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJqcyI6IlBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoeyAuLi5iYXNlT3B0aW9ucywgdGhlbWU6IFBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUksgfSkudGhlbihcbiAgKGluc3RhbmNlKSA9PiB7XG4gICAgaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcihcImFubm90YXRpb25zLmNyZWF0ZVwiLCAoYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMpID0%252BIHtcbiAgICAgIC8vIEFzc3VtaW5nIHdlIHdhbnQgdG8gZmxhdHRlbiBhbm5vdGF0aW9ucyBvbiB0aGUgcGFnZSB3aGVyZSB0aGUgYW5ub3RhdGlvbiB3YXMgYWRkZWRcbiAgICAgIGNvbnN0IHBhZ2VJbmRleGVzID0gQXJyYXkuZnJvbShcbiAgICAgICAgbmV3IFNldChhbm5vdGF0aW9ucy5tYXAoKGFubm90YXRpb24pID0%)

- [Remove inline text selection toolbar on text select](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIHtcbiAgY29uc29sZS5sb2coXCJOdXRyaWVudCBsb2FkZWQhIGJ5IE5hcmFzaGltYW5cIik7XG59KTtcbiIsIm1vZGUiOiJzdGFuZGFsb25lIn0%253D)

- [Bulk delete ALL annotations](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)
  - After the viewer loads, it gathers annotations from every page, flattens their IDs, and deletes them in a single operation. Uses totalPageCount with getAnnotations and an async IIFE to run the cleanup immediately

- [Straighten freeform highlight](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D) 
  - Convert freeform ink annotations into highlight annotations. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dJuIdtBJdcA)

- [Add ink stroke color preset to custom buttons](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%%252FIFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtLCByZWRJbmtUb29sLCBibHVlSW5rVG9vbF1cbiAgICAgICAgICA6IFsuLi50b29sYmFyLCBpdGVtXSxcbiAgICAgIFtdXG4gICAgKVxuICApO1xufSk7XG4ifQ%253D%253D)
  - Customize the toolbar to add two custom ink annotation buttons — one for red ink and one for blue ink — alongside the default ink annotation tool. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5c1Djroucjk)

- [Custom outlines for shape annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%%253D%253D)
  - Customize shape annotations by adding an outline. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9MFHv_CDwKU)

- [Customize annotation creators](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252Be2NvbnN0IHNlbGVjdE5vZGU9ZG9jdW1lbnQuY3JlYXRlRWxlbWVudCgnc2VsZWN0Jyk7c2VsZWN0Tm9kZS5pbm5lckhUTUw9Y3JlYXRvcnMubWFwKChjcmVhdG9yPT5gPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIiR7Y3JlYXRvcn1cIj4ke2NyZWF0b3J9PC9vcHRpb24%%)
  - Create and customize stamp annotations with multiple creators. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=etJAe9bJzic)

- [Prevent dragging of annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%252FaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGluZ0Fubm90YXRpb24oYW5ub3RhdGlvbix7YXV0b1NlbGVjdFRleHQ6ITF9KTpcbi8vSGFuZGxpbmcgc3BlY2lhbCBjYXNlIGZvciBOb3RlcyBzbGlnaGx0eSBkaWZmZXJlbnQgdGhhbiBUZXh0IEFubm90YXRpb25zXG5hbm5vdGF0aW9uIGluc3RhbmNlb2YgUFNQREZLaXQuQW5ub3RhdGlvbnMuTm90ZUFubm90YXRpb24%)
  - Allow special behavior for text and note annotations, while preserving default behaviors for forms and links, and restrict dragging for other annotation types.

- [Restrict dragging and editing ink annotations and signatures](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Prevent users from editing or dragging ink annotations and ink signatures, but allow them to delete them.

- [Programmatically create a comment thread](https://nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Programmatically add a comment marker annotation and an associated comment while setting the annotation creator’s name. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zaan1UNYlZ8)

- [Open URL from image annotation](https://nutrient.io/playground?)

- [Display highlighted text in annotation sidebar](https://playground.pspdfkit.com/?%) 
  - Customize the annotation sidebar to display highlighted text and allow annotation editing (except for signatures). — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fs1eeMrkXEQ)

- [Log the print activity in the sidebar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%%%252BXG4gICAgICA8cGF0aCBkPVwiTTE5IDNINWMtMS4xIDAtMiAuOS0yIDJ2MTRjMCAxLjEuOSAyIDIgMmgxNGMxLjEgMCAyLS45IDItMlY1YzAtMS4xLS45LTItMi0yem0tNSAxNEg3di0yaDd2MnptMy00SDd2LTJoMTB2MnptMC00SDdWN2gxMHYyelwiLz5cbiAgICA8L3N2Zz5gLFxuICAgIG9uUHJlc3M6IChldmVudCwgaWQpID0%252BIHtcbiAgICAgIGluc3RhbmNlLnNldFZpZXdTdGF0ZSgodmlld1N0YXRlKSA9PlxuICAgICAgICB2aWV3U3RhdGUuc2V0KFwic2lkZWJhck1vZGVcIiwgXCJDVVNUT01cIilcbiAgICAgICk7XG4gICAgfSxcbiAgfTtcbiAgXG4gIGNvbnN0IHRvb2xiYXJJdGVtcyA9IE51dHJpZW50Vmlld2VyLmRlZmF1bHRUb29sYmFySXRlbXMucmVkdWNlKFxuICAgIChhY2MsIGl0ZW0pID0%)

- [Hide link annotations tooltip](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Hide the popover element when a link annotation is selected. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_sCyG5hdG10)

- [Toggle all Annotation to show/hide with a custom button in toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)

- [Use custom renderers to display annotation information on hover](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BPC9kaXY%252BYDtcblxuICAgICAgcmV0dXJuIHtcbiAgICAgICAgbm9kZTogdG9vbHRpcENvbnRhaW5lcixcbiAgICAgICAgYXBwZW5kOiB0cnVlLFxuICAgICAgfTtcbiAgICB9LFxuICB9LFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%252BIHtcbiAgLy8gRGlzYWJsZSBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGVkaXRpbmdcbiAgaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0RWRpdGFibGVBbm5vdGF0aW9uVHlwZXMoW10pO1xuXG4gIC8vIEhlbHBlciBmdW5jdGlvbiB0byBmaW5kIGFubm90YXRpb24gZWxlbWVudCBieSBJRFxuICBjb25zdCBnZXRBbm5vdGF0aW9uRWxlbWVudCA9IChhbm5vdGF0aW9uSWQpID0%%%252BXG4gICAgaGFuZGxlQW5ub3RhdGlvbkludGVyYWN0aW9uKGV2ZW50LCBmYWxzZSlcbiAgKTtcbn0pO1xuIiwibW9kZSI6InN0YW5kYWxvbmUifQ%253D%253D)
  - Enhance annotations by adding hover-based tooltips while preventing edits. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=drdvz12ntlE)

- [Create highlight annotations programmatically from search](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Search for specific text values in a document, create highlight annotations for the found text, and apply those annotations to the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tzRcFwRbaE4)

- [Use custom actions with the embedded PDF widget button](https://nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Create a button form field, add an event listener to handle button clicks that trigger a file input for uploading images, and attach the selected image as an annotation in the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ghmh4sjwUic)

- [Prevent showing note annotation content on hover](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Add an event listener to hide the note annotation popover when the mouse is over the note icon. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wspjZ_mjLBw)

- [Link comments with annotations](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comment-annotations)
  - When an annotation is selected, a tooltip appears, allowing users to create a linked comment marker annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Gevho94VSmk)

- [Create annotations from the clipboard](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/create-annotation-from-clipboard)
  - Enable pasting content from the clipboard onto a PDF as a text or image annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1N3U0voT4Tc)

- [Navigate annotations with a custom toolbar button](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/get-all-annotations-boundingBox)
  - Get all annotation coordinates and seamlessly navigate with a custom “Next Annotation” button that highlights and jumps to each annotation. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BprV9kSGBlU)

- [Snip and save annotations as JPEG images](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-nutrient/tree/master/web/annotation/snipping-annotation)
  - Snip the area covered by an annotation and save it as a JPEG image. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QLSBa6X4tmU)

- [Add a timestamp as a subtitle to a custom stamp](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIChcbiAgICAgICAgLy8gRXZlcnkgdGltZSBTdGFtcHMgTGlzdCBvcGVucywgd2Ugd2FudCB0byBzZXQgY29ycmVjdCBkYXRlIHRvIGN1c3RvbSBzdGFtcHNcbiAgICAgICAgaW5zdGFuY2Uuc2V0U3RhbXBBbm5vdGF0aW9uVGVtcGxhdGVzKCh0ZW1wbGF0ZXMpID0%252BXG4gICAgICAgICAgdGVtcGxhdGVzLm1hcCgodGVtcGxhdGUpID0%%253D)
  - Add a custom stamp annotation template with dynamic subtitle text (including the current date and time), and set up the UI to update the subtitle each time the stamps list is opened. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TseqHd_MWcI)

- [Add PDF file as custom stamp](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)

- [Add and count a checkmark annotation in the toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Use a custom toolbar button for toggling stamp creation mode, allowing users to add "Accepted" stamp annotations on page press and track the total count of such annotations across a document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kaEmxWfG2bA)

- [Strike through text using a line annotation and automatically add a text annotation above](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%)

- [Cut, copy, and paste an annotation between pages](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJjc3MiOiIvKiBBZGQgeW91ciBDU1MgaGVyZSAqL1xuIiwic2V0dGluZ3MiOnsiZmlsZU5hbWUiOiJiYXNpYy5wZGYifSwianMiOiJQU1BERktpdC5sb2FkKHtcbiAgLi4uYmFzZU9wdGlvbnMsXG4gIHRoZW1lOiBQU1BERktpdC5UaGVtZS5EQVJLLFxuICBlbmFibGVDbGlwYm9hcmRBY3Rpb25zOiB0cnVlLFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%252BIHtcbiAgY29uc29sZS5sb2coXCJOdXRyaWVudCBsb2FkZWQhIC0gYnkgTmFyYXNoaW1hblwiKTtcblxuICAvLyBDbGlwYm9hcmQgYWN0aW9uc1xuICBjb25zdCBjb3B5ID0ge1xuICAgIHR5cGU6IFwiY3VzdG9tXCIsXG4gICAgdGl0bGU6IFwiQ29weVwiLFxuICAgIG9uUHJlc3M6IGFzeW5jICgpID0%%%%%%253D)

- [Drop stamp annotations from the toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%253D%253D)

- [Custom rendering of link annotations with pins](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%252BIHsgfSk7XG4ifQ%253D%253D)

- [Skip the Delete confirmation pop-up dialog for Annotations](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - This hook listens for the annotation deletion start event and immediately deletes the targeted annotation. It then clicks the dialog’s Cancel button to suppress the confirmation UI. The result is a seamless delete action with no pop-up interrupting the workflow

#### Redaction

- [Redact keywords programmatically](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Load a PDF, search for keywords, create redaction annotations over the found text, and apply the redactions to permanently remove the text. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGfnOXXTjWo)
  
- [Apply redactions to text with an overlay](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Load a PDF, retrieve all text lines from every page, create redaction annotations over the detected text using an overlay, and apply the redactions to the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IIciwmN-LZ4)

- [Approve or reject redactions before applying](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/redact-one-by-one)

- [Approve or reject redactions before applying — Playground](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIHtcbiAgICAgICAgICAgIC8vIEdldCBhbGwgcmVkYWN0aW9uIGFubm90YXRpb25zIGV4Y2VwdCB0aGUgY3VycmVudCBvbmVcbiAgICAgICAgICAgIGNvbnN0IGFsbFJlZGFjdGlvbkFubm90YXRpb25zID0gKGF3YWl0IGdldEFsbEFubm90YXRpb25zKCkpLmZpbHRlcihcbiAgICAgICAgICAgICAgKGEpID0%%%253D%253D)
  - Manage redaction annotations from an annotation tooltip with two options that allow you to apply or reject redactions one by one. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vAsjBmU1FA)
  
- [Add a custom tooltip to a redaction annotation](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - Add redaction tools to the toolbar and modify the tooltip behavior for redaction annotations. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1pMsyNb8y8)

#### Content Editor

- [Content Editor state change listener](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?p=eyJ2IjoxLCJzZXR0aW5ncyI6eyJmaWxlTmFtZSI6ImJhc2ljLnBkZiJ9LCJqcyI6IlBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoe1xuICAuLi5iYXNlT3B0aW9ucyxcbiAgdGhlbWU6IFBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUkssXG4gIHRvb2xiYXJJdGVtczogWy4uLlBTUERGS2l0LmRlZmF1bHRUb29sYmFySXRlbXMsIHsgdHlwZTogXCJjb250ZW50LWVkaXRvclwiIH1dLFxufSkudGhlbigoaW5zdGFuY2UpID0%%%253D%253D)

#### Comments

- [Set annotation creator name](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?)
  - Set an annotation creator’s name, ensuring any annotations — including comments — made by that user are attributed to them. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1VJzTbdY_F0)
  
- [Link comments with annotations](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comment-annotations)

- [Add custom buttons for customizing comments](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/comments-status)
  - Customize the comments popover by adding custom actions, like approve and reject, allowing users to manage comments efficiently. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lVbuW7gMuVg)
 
- [Clean Up Empty Comment Threads and Highlights](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%%%%252BIGFubm90YXRpb24uaWQgPT09IHJvb3RJZCk7XG5cblx0XHRcdFx0XHRcdGlmIChsaW5nZXJpbmdDb21tZW50TWFya2VyLmxlbmd0aCA%%%%253D)
   - Prevent stray comment markers when someone opens a thread but no longer wants it. If no real text is entered and no comments are posted, the yellow highlight/marker is auto-removed when the editor closes, keeping pages tidy. Press Escape to instantly clear temporary markers while drafting

#### Signing

- [Disable signature annotation editing](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D)
  - Customize the editability of annotations by preventing users from modifying signature annotations. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uOZbzjrgs8A)

- [Automate signature placement in form fields and restrict signature placement to other fields](https://nutrient.io/playground?%2BIHtcbiAgbGV0IHN0b3JlZFNpZ25hdHVyZTtcblxuICAvL0dldHRpbmcgYWxsIGZvcm0gZmllbGRzIHRvIHVzZSBpbiBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIHByZXNzIGV2ZW50XG4gIGNvbnN0IGZvcm1GaWVsZHMgPSBhd2FpdCBpbnN0YW5jZS5nZXRGb3JtRmllbGRzKCk7XG5cbiAgaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcihcImFubm90YXRpb25zLmNyZWF0ZVwiLCAoYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMpID0%%%)
  - Detect signature annotations and allow users to apply them to designated signature fields. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SiD59eLElKw)
 
- [Prevent Overlapping Signature Widgets](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D)
  	- Intercepts widget creation and checks the new widget’s bounding box against existing signature widgets. If an overlap is detected, it shows an alert and cancels creation; otherwise records the widget and continues

- [Display a “Sign Here" widget that guides users to the next signature field](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/signing/sign-here-upgraded)
  - Manage a signing widget in a PDF document, guiding users to the next available signature field and hiding the widget once all required signatures are completed. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DkxInhZoatI)

- [Customize the size of signature annotations](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BYW5ub3RhdGlvbiBpbnN0YW5jZW9mIFBTUERGS2l0LkFubm90YXRpb25zLklua0Fubm90YXRpb24pKSxjcmVhdGVkQW5ub3RhdGlvbnM9Y3JlYXRlZEFubm90YXRpb25zLm1hcCgoYW5ub3RhdGlvbj0%%%253D%253D)
  - Listen for the creation of signature annotations and resize and reposition them based on specific scaling factors. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wrTeL1ZRyS4)

- [Get the last signed signature field](https://nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - Listen for the creation of signature annotations and track which form field was last clicked before they were created. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NeIfQtK-Sg8)

- [Implement a multi-signer PDF signing app in Next.js](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/signing/signing-demo-complete)
  - Implement a signing app that allows multiple signers to sign PDFs using electronic signatures and customize signing fields, and that supports digital signatures for verifying document integrity. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l749tKkP1Ak)

- [Implement multi-party signing in Vanilla JS](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/document-generator-vanillajs)
  - Implement a signing app that allows different users to sign specific fields in a PDF. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1UmR6Zo8Ql4)
  
- [Navigate signature fields smoothly](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252Be3BhZ2Uuc2Nyb2xsSW50b1ZpZXcoe2Jsb2NrOidlbmQnLGlubGluZTonbmVhcmVzdCcsYmVoYXZpb3I6J3Ntb290aCd9KX0pKX1sb2NhbFN0b3JhZ2Uuc2V0SXRlbSgnZm9ybS1jb3VudGVyJywnMCcpLFBTUERGS2l0LmxvYWQoey4uLmJhc2VPcHRpb25zLHRoZW1lOlBTUERGS2l0LlRoZW1lLkRBUkssaXNFZGl0YWJsZUFubm90YXRpb246YW5ub3RhdGlvbj0%%%252FLmN1c3RvbURhdGE%%%252Be2Zvcm1FbGVtZW50c0l0ZXJhdG9yKHBhZ2VBbm5vdGF0aW9uc1tjb3VudGVyXS5wYWdlSW5kZXgscGFnZUFubm90YXRpb25zW2NvdW50ZXJdLmJvdW5kaW5nQm94KX0pLDFlMykpfSkpfSkpOyIsIm1vZGUiOiJzdGFuZGFsb25lIn0%253D)
  - Create a document signing workflow that highlights form elements with an arrow overlay to guide users through the signing process. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r3HZD6mvU6I)

- [Automatically add timestamp after eSignature](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)

- [Restrict Signature Widget to Page Bounds](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D%253D)
  - On widget creation, this should compare the widget’s bounding box to the full page rectangle and block placement if any part falls outside the page. Shows an alert and cancels creation when invalid

#### Forms

- [Add a user role dropdown to signature form fields](https://nutrient.io/playground?%252BPG9wdGlvbiB2YWx1ZT1cIlRlbmFudFwiPlRlbmFudDwvb3B0aW9uPjwvc2VsZWN0PjwvbGFiZWw%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BPC9kaXY%252BJztcbi8vRXZlbnQgbGlzdGVuZXIgdG8gY2hlY2sgd2hlaHRlciB0aGUgY2xpY2tlZCBhbm5vdGF0aW9uIGlzIGEgU2lnbmF0dXJlIFdpZGdldFxuaW5zdGFuY2UuYWRkRXZlbnRMaXN0ZW5lcignYW5ub3RhdGlvbnMucHJlc3MnLChhc3luYyBldmVudD0%%%%252FLnVzZXJSb2xlfSBmb3IgQW5ub3RhdGlvbjogJHthbm5vdGF0aW9uLmdldCgwKS5pZH1gKX0pKX0pKTsiLCJtb2RlIjoic3RhbmRhbG9uZSJ9)
  - Enhance form creator mode by adding a custom dropdown to assign user roles to signature fields. This demo focuses on UI enhancements, dynamically displaying the dropdown when a signature field is selected. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F3jx7kWNnMI)

## .NET — Coming Soon

## Design System

- [Baseline UI](https://www.nutrient.io/baseline-ui/)
  - A set of customizable and accessible React components.
  
- [Add a custom button to the main toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - How to add a custom button to the main toolbar.
  
- [Customize toolbar dropdown items to appear as independent buttons in toolbar](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - How to customize the default dropdown elements that appear in a dropdown as individual buttons in the toolbar. 
  
- [Change the label of thumbnails in the thumbnails sidebar to a string](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%)
  - Learn how to change the thumbnails label in the thumbnail sidebar to custom strings.
  
- [Change/cancel button in the Document Editor modal variant](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - Make the cancel button in the the Document Editor dialog red.
  
- [Display and change a custom state in the Create Signature modal](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%252Be2NvbnNvbGUubG9nKCdQU1BERktpdCBsb2FkZWQhJyksY29uc29sZS5sb2coJ0FQSSBkb2NzOiBodHRwczovL3BzcGRma2l0LmNvbS9hcGkvd2ViLycpLGNvbnNvbGUubG9nKCdHdWlkZXM6IGh0dHBzOi8vcHNwZGZraXQuY29tL2d1aWRlcy93ZWIvJyl9KSk7In0%253D)
  - Add a custom button in the Create Signature modal that changes a custom state.

## AI

- [AI Assistant](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/ai-document-assistant-demo)
  - Nutrient AI Assistant demo, which showcases how to interact with PDFs using natural language commands powered by AI and integrated with Nutrient Web SDK.

## Document Authoring

- [Document generator with Vanilla JavaScript](./web/document-generator-vanillajs/)
  - A fully functional step-by-step document generator that brings the user from a template to a PDF document, where they get to make modifications every step of the way. Demonstrates the combined capabilities of Nutrient Document Authoring and Web SDKs.

## iOS

- [iOS Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-ios-catalog)
  - A wide variety of examples showcasing what Nutrient iOS SDK can do. Clone it and play with it.

## Android

- [Android Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-android-catalog)
  - A wide variety of examples showcasing what Nutrient Android SDK can do. Clone it and play with it.

## Windows
- [Using Nutrient Web SDK in WinUI3 app](/windows/pspdfkit-with-winui3)
  - Learn how to use Web SDK in a WinUI3 app or any app that supports WebView2.

## Cross-Platform

- [React Native Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/react-native/tree/master/samples/Catalog)
  - A diverse range of examples showcasing what Nutrient React Native SDK is capable of. Clone the repository and explore its features firsthand.
  
- [MAUI Catalog](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-maui-catalog)
  - A diverse range of examples showcasing what Nutrient MAUI SDK is capable of. Clone the repository and explore its features.
  
- [Flutter sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/pspdfkit-flutter/tree/master/example)
  - Discover a practical example showcasing the power of Nutrient Flutter SDK.
  
- [.NET for Android sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/dotnet-pdf-library-for-android/tree/main/samples)
  - Learn how to use C# bindings for Nutrient Android SDK.
  
- [.NET for iOS sample](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/dotnet-pdf-library-for-ios/tree/main/Samples)
  - Learn how to use C# bindings for Nutrient iOS SDK.
